thread.title: Satisfaction
thread.title_full: Satisfaction - Review of Hotel Aida Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mary G
title: Satisfaction
text:
Nice staff clean room confortable bed clean bathroom with amenities.perfect location.quiet street.airport shuttle is very good idea.reasonable room price.thank you for Brice and the 2 nice ladies in reception.i hope next time the room will be bigger with bigger bathroom.it seems that this europe room size
Room Tip: I would prefer a bigger room but room was very clean and quiet See more room tips
